DOC.criteria: Personally sign date informed consent document . Renal function calculate Cockcroft Gault equation : normal function ( CLcr > =90 mL/min ) , mild : CLcr > =60 mL/min < 90 mL/min , moderate : CLcr > =30 mL/min < 60 mL/min , severe : CLcr < 30 mL/min require hemodialysis .
